about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse
matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or
general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a
direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian
factorization.
about.summary: MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver

name: mumps-seq
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.19.2
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
    name: mumps-seq
    version: 5.2.1
source:
    fn: MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
    patches:
        - examples-mpilibs.patch
        - flang-support.patch
        - shared-libseq.patch
        - shared-mumps.patch
        - shared-pord.patch
    sha256: d988fc34dfc8f5eee0533e361052a972aa69cc39ab193e7f987178d24981744a
    url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/MUMPS_5.2.1.tar.gz
build:
    number: 8
    script: '%RECIPE_DIR%\bld-seq.bat'
    string: h0f4c095_8
requirements:
    build:
        - clangdev 5.0.0 flang_3
        - cmake 3.17.0 he025d50_0
        - flang 5.0.0 he025d50_20180525
        - flang_win-64 5.0.0 20180525
        - libflang 5.0.0 h6538335_20180525
        - llvm-meta 5.0.0 0
        - m2-msys2-runtime 2.5.0.17080.65c939c 3
        - m2-patch 2.7.5 2
        - msys2-conda-epoch 20160418 1
        - openmp 5.0.0 vc14_1
        - vc 14.1 h869be7e_1
        - vs2015_runtime 14.16.27012 h30e32a0_2
        - vs2017_win-64 19.16.27038 h2e3bad8_2
        - vswhere 2.7.1 h21ff451_0
    host:
        - libblas 3.8.0 8_h8933c1f_netlib
        - libflang 5.0.0 h6538335_20180525
        - liblapack 3.8.0 8_h8933c1f_netlib
        - llvm-meta 5.0.0 0
        - m2w64-gcc-libgfortran 5.3.0 6
        - m2w64-gcc-libs 5.3.0 7
        - m2w64-gcc-libs-core 5.3.0 7
        - m2w64-gmp 6.1.0 2
        - m2w64-libwinpthread-git 5.0.0.4634.697f757 2
        - msys2-conda-epoch 20160418 1
        - openmp 5.0.0 vc14_1
        - vc 14.1 h869be7e_1
        - vs2015_runtime 14.16.27012 h30e32a0_2
    run:
        - libblas >=3.8.0,<4.0a0
        - libflang >=5.0.0
        - liblapack >=3.8.0,<3.9.0a0
        - vc >=14.1,<15.0a0
        - vs2015_runtime >=14.16.27012
test:
    commands:
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\smumps.dll" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\smumps.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\dmumps.dll" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\dmumps.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\cmumps.dll" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\cmumps.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\zmumps.dll" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\bin\zmumps.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\mumps_common.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\lib\pord.lib" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\dmumps_struc.h" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\mumps_compat.h" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\mumps_seq\mpi.h" exit 1
        - if not exist "%LIBRARY_PREFIX%\include\mumps_seq\mpif.h" exit 1
about:
    description: 'MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for
        solving

        systems of linear equations of the form Ax = b, where A is a square sparse

        matrix that can be either unsymmetric, symmetric positive definite, or

        general symmetric, on distributed memory computers. MUMPS implements a

        direct method based on a multifrontal approach which performs a Gaussian

        factorization.

        '
    doc_url: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/index.php?page=doc
    home: http://mumps.enseeiht.fr/
    license: CECILL-C
    license_file: LICENSE
    summary: 'MUMPS: a parallel sparse direct solver'
extra:
    copy_test_source_files: true
    final: true
    recipe-maintainers:
        - SylvainCorlay
        - basnijholt
        - dalcinl
        - davidbrochart
        - jbweston
        - minrk

about.description:
MUMPS (MUltifrontal Massively Parallel Solver) is a package for solving
